title: OXO Salad Dressing Shaker
description: Making a quick dressing is a cinch with the OXO Salad Dressing Shaker. The watertight Shaker offers a clean, neat and convenient way to mix, serve and store dressings, sauces and marinades. The top unscrews to reveal a wide opening ideal for adding a range of ingredients like oil, vinegar, mayonnaise, mustard, garlic, onions and spices. The Shaker is made of a BPA-free, break-resistant and dishwasher safe material. Once ingredients are added, screw the top on and shake to quickly mix dressings with no spills. The top lever flips back for pouring and forward to seal. Use the Shaker to store leftover dressing and sauce right inside the fridge.

Making a quick dressing is a cinch with the OXO Salad Dressing Shaker. The watertight Shaker offers a clean, neat and convenient way to mix, serve and store dressings, sauces and marinades. The top unscrews to reveal a wide opening ideal for adding a range of ingredients like oil, vinegar, mayonnaise, mustard, garlic, onions and spices. The Shaker is made of a BPA-free, break-resistant and dishwasher safe material. Once ingredients are added, screw the top on and shake to quickly mix dressings with no spills. The top lever flips back for pouring and forward to seal. Use the Shaker to store leftover dressing and sauce right inside the fridge.

If you have questions or comments on the OXO Salad Dressing Shaker, reach out to us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/OXO or Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/OXO.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: Hi, I'm Leena from OXO here to demonstrate our handy salad dressing shaker. This water tight leak proof bpa proof shaker is great for measuring, mixing, serving, and storing salad dressing. It's 12 ounce capacity is perfect for large dinner parties or for making extra to use later in the week. A large opening makes it easy to add a range of ingredients like oil vinegar and seasoning. Measurement markings at the side help you keep track as ingredients are added. When you're finished adding ingredients, a screw top and non slip ring make it easy to shake vigorously without leaks even if your hands are wet or oily. When you're ready to serve, the lever on the top flips back to pour and forward to seal with just one hand. The pointed spout is great for drip free pouring and the silicone gasket helps keep dressing fresh. When you're done, just put in the dish washer for easy cleaning. OXO salad dressing shakers are also great for sauces and marinades.
